vocabularies.example:
We read books in the library.
You must be quiet in the library.
I go to the library every Thursday.

I use a dictionary to learn new words.
Can I borrow your dictionary?
This dictionary is very heavy.

We look at the map in geography class.
Can you find Vietnam on the map?
There is a big map on the wall.

grammars.description: Diễn tả sự bắt buộc hoặc cần thiết.
grammars.example:
I have to wear a uniform to school.
We had to do a lot of homework yesterday.

vocabularies.example:
My sister has long curly hair.
Is your hair straight or curly?
She looks beautiful with curly hair.

My grandfather has a white beard.
He is growing a beard.
Does your dad have a beard?

He is very strong, he can lift the table.
Eat your vegetables to stay strong.
An elephant is a very strong animal.

grammars.description: So sánh hơn giữa hai người hoặc vật.
grammars.example:
My brother is taller than me.
This book is better than that one.

vocabularies.example:
I go roller-skating in the park.
Do you want to go roller-skating with me?
It is fun to go roller-skating.

I love taking photos of flowers.
He takes photos with his new camera.
Smile! I want to take a photo.

We can sail on the lake.
He wants to sail around the world.
Can you sail a boat?

grammars.description: Thì hiện tại tiếp diễn dùng cho kế hoạch tương lai.
grammars.example:
I'm going roller-skating tomorrow.
We're taking photos at the party tonight.

vocabularies.example:
We saw a funny movie at the cinema.
Where is the nearest cinema?
Let's go to the cinema this weekend.

I help my mom at the supermarket.
The supermarket is near my house.
We buy food at the supermarket.

My aunt works as a nurse in a hospital.
He is in the hospital because he is ill.
The hospital is a big building.

grammars.description: Giới từ chỉ nơi chốn (opposite, near, above, below).
grammars.example:
The cinema is opposite the park.
The map is above the dictionary.

vocabularies.example:
It is a cloudy day today.
I can't see the sun because it's cloudy.
Cloudy weather is cool.

It's always sunny in the summer.
Put on your hat, it's very sunny.
I like sunny weather.

The trees are moving because it's windy.
It's a perfect day to fly a kite, it's windy.
My hair is messy because it's windy.

grammars.description: Mệnh đề với 'When' để nói về các tình huống.
grammars.example:
When it's sunny, we go to the beach.
I wear a coat when it's cold.

vocabularies.example:
Bats fly at night.
Bats live in caves.
A bat is a small animal.

The bear is brown and big.
Bears like eating honey.
I saw a bear in the forest.

Dolphins are very clever.
We saw dolphins in the sea.
Dolphins like to jump.

A kangaroo can jump high.
Kangaroos live in Australia.
The baby kangaroo is in its mother's pocket.

The lion is the king of the jungle.
Lions are very strong.
I saw a lion at the zoo.

Pandas are black and white.
Pandas like eating bamboo.
They are very cute pandas.

Penguins like cold weather.
Penguins can swim but can't fly.
I like watching penguins walk.

The rabbit has long ears.
Rabbits like eating carrots.
My rabbit is very soft.

Sharks live in the ocean.
Be careful, there's a shark!
Sharks have sharp teeth.

A whale is a very big animal.
Whales live in the sea.
We saw a whale from the boat.

There is a fly in my soup!
Birds can fly high.
Don't let the fly touch the food.

The kitten is very small.
My cat has three kittens.
I love playing with my kitten.

I want a puppy for my birthday.
The puppy is barking.
He is a very cute puppy.

The parrot can talk.
Parrots have colorful feathers.
He has a pet parrot.

Camels live in the desert.
A camel has a hump.
We rode a camel on vacation.

The donkey is carrying a heavy bag.
Donkeys look like small horses.
I saw a donkey on the farm.

The goat is eating grass.
Goats give us milk.
My uncle has many goats.

The lizard is on the wall.
Some lizards can change color.
I'm not afraid of lizards.

The swan is white and beautiful.
Swans are swimming on the lake.
An ugly duckling became a swan.

Tigers have orange and black stripes.
A tiger is a wild cat.
The tiger is sleeping.

Zebras have black and white stripes.
I saw zebras in the safari park.
A zebra looks like a horse.

The hippo is in the water.
Hippos are very big and heavy.
A hippo can stay underwater for a long time.

A giraffe has a very long neck.
Giraffes eat leaves from tall trees.
I saw a giraffe at the zoo.

An elephant has a long trunk.
Elephants are the biggest land animals.
The elephant is very strong.

The monkey is climbing the tree.
Monkeys like eating bananas.
That's a funny monkey!

grammars.description: Diễn tả khả năng.
grammars.example:
A bird can fly, but a penguin can't.
Can you see the dolphin?

vocabularies.example:
My back hurts.
Carry your bag on your back.
Lie on your back.

I'm wearing a scarf around my neck.
A giraffe has a long neck.
Wash your neck.

He has broad shoulders.
I have a bag on my shoulder.
Touch your shoulders.

I have a stomach ache.
My stomach is full.
Don't eat too much, your stomach will hurt.

I have a loose tooth.
Brush every tooth.
I need to see the dentist for my tooth.

Clean your teeth twice a day.
She has white teeth.
How many teeth do you have?

I have a headache.
I have a toothache.
My legs ache after the run.

He has a bad cough.
Cover your mouth when you cough.
I've had a cough for two days.

I have a terrible headache.
Do you have a headache?
Take some medicine for your headache.

He has a high temperature.
The doctor checked my temperature.
The temperature is 38 degrees.

I have to take my medicine.
This medicine tastes sweet.
Where is your medicine?

He is in the hospital.
The hospital is very big.
Go to the hospital if you feel very sick.

The nurse is very kind.
My mother is a nurse.
A nurse works in a hospital.

I have an earache.
It hurts to have an earache.
Does your earache feel better?

Don't cry, everything is okay.
The baby is crying.
Why are you crying?

Don't shout in the library!
He shouted my name.
She shouted for help.

Smile for the camera!
She has a beautiful smile.
He smiled at me.

He is very thin.
This book is very thin.
He has thin arms.

The cat is very fat.
Don't eat too much fat.
He is a fat panda.

Call the doctor.
I'll call you later.
Call my name.

I feel better today.
This is better than that.
I hope you get better soon.

I'm very well, thank you.
He isn't well today.
Get well soon.

He is ill and stays at home.
I feel ill.
Are you ill?

The doctor is very busy.
I want to be a doctor.
See the doctor today.

Wash your hands before dinner.
Wash your face.
I need to wash my car.

grammars.description: Hỏi về vấn đề sức khỏe.
grammars.example:
What's the matter with you?
I have a headache.

vocabularies.example:
Put on your coat, it's cold.
I have a blue coat.
Where is my coat?

Wear gloves in winter.
My gloves are red.
I lost one of my gloves.

A long wool scarf.
She's wearing a yellow scarf.
I need a scarf today.

My grandma knitted this sweater.
It's a warm sweater.
I like your green sweater.

I wear glasses for reading.
Where are my glasses?
She has new glasses.

My mom has a leather handbag.
What's in your handbag?
She carries a small handbag.

Take off your hat inside.
I have a sun hat.
That's a funny hat!

My socks are white.
I need a pair of socks.
Where is the other sock?

I'm wearing a white T-shirt.
He has a T-shirt with a lion on it.
I like this T-shirt.

My trousers are too long.
I have blue trousers.
Wear your black trousers.

My shoes are dirty.
Put on your shoes.
I have new school shoes.

Wear boots in the rain.
These are heavy boots.
I like my red boots.

She's wearing a pink skirt.
My school skirt is blue.
I like that skirt.

She has a beautiful dress.
I'm wearing a dress to the party.
Is that a new dress?

What time is it on your watch?
I have a new watch.
My watch is broken.

I like wearing jeans.
These jeans are blue.
My jeans are old.

He's wearing a white shirt.
My dad has many shirts.
I need to wash my shirt.

I'm wearing a light jacket.
Where is my jacket?
Put your jacket on.

I have a coin in my pocket.
My pocket is empty.
Put it in your pocket.

I need a belt for my trousers.
My belt is black.
Wear a belt.

I wear a uniform to school.
My school uniform is blue.
Do you like your uniform?

What are you wearing?
I wear glasses.
Wear a warm coat.

Put on your shoes.
Put on your hat.
I am putting on my coat.

Take off your shoes.
Take off your hat.
I am taking off my jacket.

What size do you need?
This is the wrong size.
I need a bigger size.

grammars.description: Mô tả quần áo đang mặc.
grammars.example:
He is wearing a red T-shirt.
I am wearing blue jeans.

vocabularies.example:
A bowl of soup.
Put the fruit in the bowl.
I have a cereal bowl.

A cup of tea.
Can I have a cup of water?
My favorite cup is blue.

A glass of milk.
Drink a glass of water.
Be careful with the glass.

Put your sandwich on the plate.
The plate is clean.
I have a big plate.

A bottle of juice.
Drink from the bottle.
Where is your water bottle?

I like cheese on my pizza.
Do you want some cheese?
Cheese is made from milk.

I love eating pasta.
Mom is cooking pasta for dinner.
Pasta is an Italian food.

I have a green salad.
Eat some salad with your chicken.
Salad is very healthy.

Hot soup is good for a cold.
I'm eating tomato soup.
Do you want some soup?

Eat your vegetables.
I like many kinds of vegetables.
Carrots are vegetables.

Fruit is sweet.
Apples and oranges are fruit.
I like fruit salad.

I don't eat meat.
This meat is delicious.
Do you like meat?

I have bread for breakfast.
Fresh bread smells good.
Butter on bread is nice.

My dad drinks coffee.
Coffee is brown.
I don't like coffee.

Would you like a cup of tea?
Tea is a hot drink.
I like iced tea.

Orange juice is good.
I want some apple juice.
Fresh fruit juice.

Drink your milk.
Milk is white.
I have milk with my cereal.

Can I have some water, please?
Water is very important.
Drink enough water every day.

I have a ham sandwich.
Make a sandwich for lunch.
This sandwich is big.

I like burgers with cheese.
We go to the burger restaurant.
A burger and fries.

I like fish and chips.
Don't eat too many chips.
Potato chips are salty.

I love chocolate ice cream.
Can I have an ice cream?
It's very cold, don't eat ice cream.

A birthday cake.
I'm baking a cake.
Would you like some cake?

Don't eat too many sweets.
I love sweets.
My dentist says no sweets.

I'm feeling hunger.
Are you hungry?
He has a big appetite.

grammars.description: Mời hoặc hỏi ý kiến.
grammars.example:
Would you like some juice?
I'd like a sandwich, please.

vocabularies.example:
I have a warm blanket.
Put the blanket on the bed.
A soft blue blanket.

Put the books on the shelf.
The shelf is full of toys.
A wooden shelf.

Go up the stairs.
Go down the stairs.
Be careful on the stairs.

Put it on the table.
Sit at the table.
A big dinner table.

Sit on the chair.
Move your chair.
A comfy chair.

Open the door.
Close the door.
Lock the door.

Look out the window.
Close the window.
Clean the window.

Sit on the floor.
Clean the floor.
The floor is wet.

A picture on the wall.
Paint the wall.
A white wall.

Dry your hands with a towel.
I need a clean towel.
A beach towel.

Wash with soap.
I need some soap.
Smell the soap.

Where is my toothbrush?
A new toothbrush.
Use your toothbrush.

Put toothpaste on your brush.
Minty toothpaste.
I need more toothpaste.

Have a hot bath.
The bath is ready.
Sit in the bath.

Have a quick shower.
Turn on the shower.
I like showers.

Go to bed.
Make your bed.
A big bed.

Play in the garden.
A beautiful garden.
Flowers in the garden.

Cook in the kitchen.
A clean kitchen.
Mom is in the kitchen.

Watch TV in the living room.
A big living room.
Sit in the living room.

Sleep in your bedroom.
My bedroom is blue.
Go to your bedroom.

Go to the bathroom.
Clean the bathroom.
Is anyone in the bathroom?

Stay at home.
Go home.
Home sweet home.

A big house.
My house is pink.
Build a house.

I live in a flat.
A small flat.
His flat is on the third floor.

Go upstairs.
My room is upstairs.
Is he upstairs?

grammars.description: Liệt kê các đồ vật trong nhà.
grammars.example:
There is a blanket on the bed.
There are many toys on the shelf.

vocabularies.example:
I need to go to the bank.
The bank is next to the shop.
Where is the nearest bank?

Let's meet at the café.
I like the cake in this café.
A small quiet café.

We saw a movie at the cinema.
The cinema is in the city center.
Let's go to the cinema.

grammars.description: Cách chỉ đường cơ bản.
grammars.example: Go straight on and turn left at the park.

vocabularies.example:
I play badminton with my sister.
Badminton is fun.
He has a badminton racket.

He plays baseball at school.
A baseball bat.
Do you like baseball?

He's very good at basketball.
A basketball hoop.
Play basketball in the park.

I love playing football.
A football match.
Kick the football.

They play hockey on grass.
A hockey stick.
Is hockey difficult?

We play table tennis in the garage.
A small table tennis ball.
I'm good at table tennis.

Play tennis on the court.
A tennis racket.
Do you want to play tennis?

I like to skate in winter.
Can you skate?
Go to the skating rink.

I swim every Friday.
Can you swim under water?
Swim in the pool.

Don't climb the tree!
Climb a mountain.
He likes climbing.

She likes to dance.
A beautiful dance.
Let's dance!

Go fishing at the lake.
I caught a big fish.
Fishing is relaxing.

Ride a bike.
Ride a horse.
Can you ride a motorbike?

Run fast!
I run in the park.
A long run.

She sings very well.
Sing a song.
I like singing.

Walk to school.
A long walk.
Walk in the rain.

Paint a picture.
Paint the wall.
I like painting.

Draw a dog.
Draw with a pencil.
That's a nice drawing.

I help my mom cook.
A great cook.
Cook dinner.

Read a book.
Read a story.
I like reading comics.

Write your name.
Write a letter.
Write in your notebook.

Listen to music.
Listen to the teacher.
Are you listening?

Watch TV.
Watch a movie.
Watch the birds.

Play games.
Play with toys.
Play a musical instrument.

Jump high!
Jump over the puddle.
Don't jump on the bed.

grammars.description: Diễn tả sở thích.
grammars.example:
I like playing football.
She likes dancing.

vocabularies.example:
Good morning!
In the morning I have breakfast.
A sunny morning.

In the afternoon I do my homework.
Good afternoon!
See you this afternoon.

In the evening I watch TV.
Good evening!
A quiet evening.

Good night!
Sleep at night.
Stars shine at night.

Today is Monday.
I am happy today.
What's the weather today?

I went to the zoo yesterday.
It was sunny yesterday.
Where were you yesterday?

See you tomorrow!
I will go swimming tomorrow.
Tomorrow is my birthday.

Have a nice weekend!
I play games at the weekend.
What are you doing this weekend?

I go to school on Monday.
Monday is the first day of the week.
See you next Monday.

We have English on Tuesday.
Tuesday morning.
Is it Tuesday today?

Happy Wednesday!
I swim on Wednesday.
Wednesday afternoon.

I play football on Thursday.
Thursday evening.
See you on Thursday.

I love Friday.
School finishes on Friday.
Friday night.

I go to the park on Saturday.
Saturday is fun.
A busy Saturday.

I stay at home on Sunday.
Sunday is a day of rest.
Sunday morning.

It's seven o'clock.
I wake up at six o'clock.
See you at four o'clock.

It's half past eight.
I have lunch at half past twelve.
Half past four.

It's quarter past nine.
School starts at quarter past eight.
Quarter past one.

It's quarter to ten.
I go home at quarter to four.
Quarter to seven.

What's your phone number?
A lucky number.
Pick a number.

Twenty students in the class.
I am twenty years old.
Number twenty.

Thirty minutes.
It costs thirty dollars.
Number thirty.

Forty children.
Forty years ago.
Number forty.

Fifty percent.
Fifty cents.
Number fifty.

One hundred dollars.
A hundred people.
One hundred percent.

grammars.structure: Prepositions of time: On, At, In
grammars.description: Cách dùng giới từ chỉ thời gian.
grammars.example: On Monday. At six o'clock. In the morning.

vocabularies.example:
The plane is in the sky.
I travel by plane.
A big white plane.

A noisy helicopter.
The helicopter landed safely.
I saw a helicopter.

Go to school by bus.
Wait for the bus.
A red bus.

Travel by coach.
The coach is comfortable.
A long coach trip.

A big truck.
The truck carries heavy boxes.
A blue truck.

The lorry is driving fast.
A delivery lorry.
Look at that big lorry!

The farmer drives a tractor.
A red tractor on the farm.
I like tractors.

The boat is on the river.
A small fishing boat.
Sail a boat.

A big ship in the ocean.
The ship is sailing away.
A cruise ship.

Travel by train.
The train is fast.
Wait for the train.

I ride my bike to school.
A new bike.
I love my bike.

My dad has a motorbike.
Motorbikes are noisy.
Wear a helmet on a motorbike.

The bus driver is kind.
A racing driver.
My dad is a good driver.

The passengers are on the bus.
A busy passenger.
Wait for the passengers.

I love to travel.
Travel by train.
Where do you want to travel?

Buy a ticket.
A train ticket.
Show your ticket.

A school trip.
A long trip.
Enjoy your trip!

Go on vacation.
Summer vacation.
A fun vacation.

My school bag.
A heavy bag.
What's in your bag?

grammars.description: Nói về phương tiện di chuyển.
grammars.example:
They go to school by bus.
We travel by plane.

vocabularies.example:
A high mountain.
Climb a mountain.
Snow on the mountain.

Walk up the hill.
The house is on the hill.
A green hill.

The river is long.
Swim in the river.
A boat on the river.

The lake is quiet.
A beautiful lake.
Fishing in the lake.

Trees in the forest.
Wild animals live in the forest.
A dark forest.

A thick jungle.
Monkeys live in the jungle.
Explore the jungle.

Live on an island.
A small island.
Go to the island by boat.

Cows in the field.
A green field.
Play in the field.

Work on a farm.
A noisy farm.
Live on a farm.

A beautiful flower.
Smell the flower.
A red flower.

Sit on the grass.
Green grass.
Cut the grass.

Climb a tree.
A tall tree.
Apples on the tree.

A green leaf.
The leaf fell off the tree.
A small leaf.

Autumn leaves.
The leaves are yellow.
Many leaves on the ground.

Water the plants.
A small plant.
Green plants.

Sit on the ground.
The ground is wet.
Hard ground.

A big rock.
Sit on a rock.
Hard rock.

Throw a stone.
A small stone.
Walking on stones.

The sky is blue.
Stars in the sky.
Look at the sky.

Shining star.
A bright star.
Look at the stars.

The moon is round.
Full moon.
Look at the moon.

All around the world.
A big world.
Save the world.

Love nature.
Beautiful nature.
Protect nature.

Clean the environment.
Protect our environment.
Green environment.

I go to the beach in summer.
A beautiful beach.
Play on the beach.

Swim in the sea.
The sea is blue.
Sail on the sea.

Play in the sand.
Yellow sand.
Sand castles.

The sun is hot.
Shine like the sun.
The sun is yellow.

The big ocean.
Deep blue ocean.
Swim in the ocean.

Live in a village.
A small quiet village.
My village is beautiful.

grammars.description: So sánh nhất (ngắn).
grammars.example:
The mountain is the highest.
This is the smallest island.

vocabularies.example:
The street is very busy.
I am busy with my homework.
A busy day.

Be careful with the glass!
A careful driver.
She is a careful worker.

A clever student.
That's a clever idea.
He is very clever with computers.

This is a difficult question.
The test was very difficult.
English is not difficult.

This is an easy game.
The homework was easy.
A very easy task.

An exciting movie.
The game was exciting.
That's exciting news!

A famous singer.
This city is famous for its bridge.
He wants to be famous.

I'm frightened of spiders.
The child looks frightened.
Don't be frightened.

She is a kind person.
Thank you for your kind words.
What kind of fruit do you like?

Loud music.
A loud noise.
Don't speak so loud.

A naughty boy.
Don't be naughty!
The dog was very naughty.

Be quiet!
A quiet village.
It's very quiet here.

A rich man.
He wants to get rich.
Rich food is heavy.

A soft pillow.
Soft fur.
This bread is very soft.

A terrible noise.
The weather was terrible.
I feel terrible.

I'm very tired.
A tired child.
You look tired.

A weak person.
I feel weak.
A weak tea.

This is the worst day of my life.
The worst movie.
That was his worst mistake.

My best friend.
The best player.
You are the best!

A boring book.
The lesson was boring.
I'm bored.

A brave soldier.
Be brave!
A brave thing to do.

The box is empty.
An empty street.
An empty glass.

A full glass.
The bus is full.
I'm full.

grammars.description: So sánh hơn với tính từ dài.
grammars.example:
This book is more exciting than that one.
English is more difficult than math.

vocabularies.example:
Ask a question.
Ask for help.
Ask the teacher.

Answer the question.
Answer the phone.
Know the answer.

Bring your books.
I'll bring some food.
Bring me a glass of water.

Buy a new car.
Buy some bread.
Where did you buy that?

Carry a bag.
Can you carry this?
Carry the baby.

Choose a color.
Which one do you choose?
Choose your favorite toy.

Don't drop the glass!
I dropped my pen.
Drop it in the box.

I can't find my keys.
Look and find.
Find the cat.

Get a present.
Get home.
I got a good grade.

Give me the book.
Give a present.
Give it to him.

Help your mom.
Can you help me?
Help me with my homework.

Hide behind the tree.
Hide the ball.
Play hide and seek.

Hold my hand.
Hold the baby.
Hold on tight.

I hope it's sunny tomorrow.
I hope you feel better.
Hope for the best.

I know the answer.
Do you know him?
I don't know.

Laugh at a joke.
Don't laugh at me!
A loud laugh.

Learn English.
Learn to swim.
Learn a new song.

I'm looking for my dog.
Look for your keys.
Look for a present.

She looks like her mom.
It looks like rain.
What does it look like?

Lose your keys.
Lose the game.
I don't want to lose.

What does this word mean?
I mean it.
What do you mean?

You must listen.
Must I go now?
I must finish my work.

I need some water.
Do you need help?
I need a new pen.

Pick up your toys.
Pick up the phone.
Pick up a leaf.

I don't understand.
Do you understand the question?
I understand now.

grammars.description: Thì quá khứ đơn với động từ có quy tắc.
grammars.example:
I help -> I helped.
We play -> We played.

vocabularies.example:
All children.
All the time.
That's all.

Any questions?
Do you have any brothers?
Pick any color.

Another cup of tea?
Another day.
Choose another one.

Both friends.
I like both.
Both hands.

Each student.
Each day.
Five dollars each.

Every day.
Every child.
Every time.

Everyone is here.
Hello everyone!
Everyone knows that.

Everything is okay.
Tell me everything.
Put everything in the box.

Someone is knocking.
I saw someone.
Someone left this.

I have something for you.
There's something in my eye.
Eat something.

Nothing is left.
There's nothing in the box.
I have nothing to say.

How often do you swim?
How often do you eat fruit?
How often is the bus?

How much is this?
How much milk do you want?
How much does it cost?

How many books?
How many brothers do you have?
How many apples?

What is your name?
What are you doing?
What's the matter?

Where are you?
Where is the bank?
Where do you live?

When is your birthday?
When do you go to sleep?

vocabularies.example:
I went to school.
We went home.
He went to the park.

He came to my house.
She came late.
They came by bus.

I saw a bird.
We saw a movie.
He saw his friend.

I had breakfast.
We had fun.
He had a cold.

I did my homework.
What did you do?

He said hello.
She said nothing.
What did he say?

I ate an apple.
We ate pizza.

I drank some water.

He gave me a book.

I made a cake.

I slept well.

I bought a new toy.

I found my keys.

I read a book.

I lost my pen.

grammars.description: Thì quá khứ đơn với động từ bất quy tắc.
grammars.example:
I go -> I went.
I see -> I saw.

vocabularies.example:
Excuse me, where is the bank?
Excuse me, can you help me?
Excuse me, is this your bag?

Pardon? Can you say that again?
I beg your pardon.
Pardon me.

Thanks for help. - No problem!
No problem, I can do it.
It's no problem at all.

Can I help? - Of course!
Of course you can.
Yes, of course.

I'm sorry. - Never mind!
Never mind, it's okay.
Never mind about that.

Thank you! - You're welcome!
You're very welcome.
You are welcome.

Goodbye, take care!
Take care of yourself.
See you, take care.

Goodbye, see you later!
See you later alligator.
Okay, see you later.

Good luck with your test!
I wish you good luck.
Good luck to you.

Well done, you won!
A very well done task.
Well done everyone!

Come on, we're late!
Come on, you can do it.
Oh, come on!

Look out! There's a car.
Look out for the dog.
Look out!

Watch out! It's hot.
Watch out for the cat.
Watch out!

Be careful with that.
Please be careful.
Be careful!

Don't worry, be happy.
Don't worry about me.
Everything is okay, don't worry.

Hurry up, the bus is here!
We must hurry up.
Please hurry up.

Slow down, you're driving too fast.
Please slow down.
Slow down a bit.

I hope you get well soon.
Here is a card, get well soon!
Get well soon, my friend.

Happy birthday to you!
Have a great happy birthday.
Happy birthday!

How about a pizza?
How about going to the park?
How about you?

What's the matter? Are you okay?
Tell me what's the matter.
What is the matter?

Would you like some tea?
Would you like to play?
What would you like?

Is it sunny? - I think so.
I think so too.
Yes, I think so.

Will you win? - I hope so!
I hope so too.
I really hope so.

Where is he? - I don't know.
I'm sorry, I don't know.
I don't know the answer.

Maybe it will rain.
Maybe next time.
Maybe yes, maybe no.

Perhaps he is late.
Perhaps we can go.
Perhaps.

Me too.
It's too hot.
I like it too.

I don't like it either.
Me either.
Either one is fine.

I like pizza. - So do I!
I'm hungry. - So am I!
So do I.
